babel-desc: Pa'asɛ #babel "Parisee" n tuni se'em ti la basɛ ti amiŋa maalegɔ n dei "Babel" tuntuna daka "column" naɛ la se'em ti fu wam ta'am dikɛ lagum la "custum templates"
babel-autocreate-text-levels: Tuntuneba n boi buuri buuri wa puan pa'ali ti ba tarı la mi'ilum bɔna $1 n boi yetɔgum $2.
babel-autocreate-text-main: Tuntuneba n boi buuri buuri wa puan pa'ali ti ba tarı la mi'ilum bɔna yetɔgum $1 puan.
babel-0: Tuntuna wa tarı la [[$1|aayi]] mi'ilum bɔna [[$2|$3]] (bii bɔkerɛ la n ti la paɛ beene la wugerɛ).
babel-2: Tuntuna wa tarı la [[$1|tiŋasuka]] mi'ilum bɔna [[$2|$3]].
babel-3: Tuntuna wa tarı la [[$1|adeŋɛ te'ele]] mi'ilum bɔna [[$2|$3]].
babel-4: Tuntuna wa tarı la [[$1| lɛm la tiŋa la puan nɛra]] mi'ilum bɔna [[$2|$3]].
babel-5: Tuntuna wa tarı la [[$1|, baŋerɛ zo'e zo'e]] mi'ilum bɔna [[$2|$3]].
babel-N: Tuntuna wa tarı la [[$1|tiŋa la puan]] bɔkerɛ bɔna [[$2|$3]].
babel-0-n: Tuntuna kana ka tari [[$1|no]] mi'ilum [[$2|farefare]] (bii bɔkerɛ n toi)
babel-1-n: Tuntuna wa tarı la [[$1|pɔsega]] mi'ilum bɔna [[$2|farefare]].
babel-2-n: Tuntuna wa tarı la [[$1|tiŋasuka]] mi'ilum bɔna [[$2|farefare]].
babel-3-n: Tuntuna wa tarı la [[$1| Adeŋɛ te'ele]] mi'ilum bɔna [[$2|farefare]].
babel-4-n: Tuntuna wa tarı la [[$1| lɛm la tiŋa la puan nɛra]] mi'ilum bɔna [[$2|farefare]].
babel-5-n: Tuntuna wa tarı la [[$1|, baŋerɛ zo'e zo'e]] mi'ilum bɔna [[$2|farefare]].
babel-N-n: Tuntuna wa tarı la [[$1|tiŋa la puan]] bɔkerɛ bɔna [[$2|farefare]].
